name: real-time-phone-call-agent
description: Real-time phone call processing with Twilio bridge and AssemblyAI transcription - Railway optimized

scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('✅ Environment check:'); console.log('ASSEMBLYAI_API_KEY:', process.env.ASSEMBLYAI_API_KEY ? '✅ SET' : '❌ MISSING'); console.log('BRIDGE_TARGET_NUMBER:', process.env.BRIDGE_TARGET_NUMBER ? '✅ SET' : '❌ MISSING'); console.log('TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID:', process.env.TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID ? '✅ SET' : '❌ MISSING'); console.log('TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN:', process.env.TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN ? '✅ SET' : '❌ MISSING');"

author: Your Name
